people_also_ask.question: Does Super Mario Bros ever end?
people_also_ask.heading: The game ends when the player runs out of lives, although a button input can be used on the game over screen to continue from the first level of the world in which the player died. Mario's primary attack is jumping on top of enemies, though many enemies have differing responses to this.
people_also_ask.title: Super Mario Bros. - Wikipedia

knowledge_panel.description: mario bros. is a 1983 platform game developed and published for arcades by nintendo. it was designed by shigeru miyamoto and gunpei yokoi, nintendo's chief engineer. italian plumber mario and his twin brother luigi exterminate creatures emerging from the sewers by knocking them upside-down and kicking them away. wikipedia
